name: Skyward dash
description:
Swipe left or right to control the ball.
Bounce on the platforms. Hit them in the center to get a speed boost.
If you miss and fall, it’s over.

Smash through the level ceilings to get to the next stage and get an insane speed boost.
Chain boosts for even more boosts. If you want to slowly cruise, you can - but if you’re here for rush speed, you’re going to get serious speed!

Get diamonds along the way to unlock new balls.
